description.en:
AgroCash X is a decentralized currency, subject only to its respective demand.

With the development of technologies in the agricultural sector in full swing, the financial movement of the sector could not be different, AgroCash X will bring solutions to problems that society has faced several times throughout its history, such as inflation, economic cycles and the shortage universal access to financial services for the entire population.

It also intends to solve the problem that has most affected producers in emerging countries, the issue of exchange rate fluctuation.

AgroCash X then emerges as a solution for the sector responsible for much of the success of the economic indices of the main world economies.
